Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Small quiet location away from busier restaurant areas might make you think that this is an average place, but the food was exceptional and the staff were all incredibly friendly. Highly recommend the chateaubriand and sea bass, and the octopus and salmon starters were also excellent. For vegetarians, the ravioli was also very good.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Wow, what a fantastic restaurant. Intimate with a real local and warm feel. The food was incredible (order the lamb if it's still on the menu) and we could not believe how hard the lovely owners were working.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text:
Simply amazing.
On the photo: Valens rib roast and Chateaubriand
The photo contains a less than the real portion. It was hard to resist. â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Great food!!! I donâ€™t usually eat meat but their chateaubriand is amazing. Service was okay.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text:
I love how quite hidden SenT is in De Pijp!
The food is well-served and tasteful. Their CrÃ¨me BrÃ»lÃ©e is the best!
Please go find this little gem, you wonâ€™t regret!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Cute place run by a husband and wife. Food was delicious. And although this is a steak place, I was blown away by the deserts. Order two if you have the room in your stomach!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Although as a French guy, i was impressed not to have bread (maybe baguette) to dip in the very tasteful gravy, this restaurant is purely amazing. I would recommend a million times!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text:
We've had a few meals here on separate trips to Amsterdam.

It's tucked away a little outside of the main centre but still really easy to â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: One of the very best restaurant in Amsterdam and arguably the best ambiance in Amsterdamâ€¦ family run and what a service!! Fun and professional.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: This place was excellent value with great customer service and amazing tasting dishes. Their meats are excellently cooked, their chips are one of the best I've ever had and I'm from the UK. Really good affordable wines and lush deserts. I â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Great selection of wine that matches their selection of delicious meat. Starters were all great, loved the teriyaki tataki the most. The meat was superb along with fries and fresh salad. We werenâ€™t able to finish the meat but wanted to try their desert which was fab! An overall great restaurant with friendly service.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, nice staff and juicy meat!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: We chose this restaurant for a special birthday. We were a group of 8 and we all spent a fabulous time there ! Every was perfect, the place, the staff, the food! Absolutely recommend this place for a special occasion or a romantic dinner. I â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Amazing meat and sea bass! The cheese plater also a highlight! Very friendly staff, great to get away from the buzz of downtown.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The staff is amazing, always smiling and helpful, even when they are terribly busy. But lack of staffing made us wait around 1 hour 15 minutes until we receive our food, which is not really ideal. Chateaubriand was â€˜allrightâ€™, however the â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Perfect place for a good piece of meet, nice wine recommendations.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Walked in. Short menu. Turned out that we loved whatever we ordered. Very delicate but unpretended with full of pleasant surprise. The food comforted us after travelling among cities.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The food and wine here are amazing!  There is a resident cat, that in my opinion, is just a perfect addition to this place.  Roasted duck, steamed bun with pork.  Save room for dessert, because I didn't!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Really like the restaurant, best steak!! Good location in depijp, good service. Definitely will go again.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text:
On a quiet street, signage not clear.

Beef was cooked nicely and itâ€™s very soft but lacked beefy taste which I prefer. â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: From starter to dessert - amazing!! Canâ€™t wait to come again.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: we had a pretty good dinner, although the meat was not amazing, I was a bit surprised they did not even ask how I wanted mine (medium, rare etc). All in all nice atmosphere and service. Reservation needed

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The ribeye is overcooked and the waitress didnâ€™t ask me how should the steak be cooked(rare, medium rare, etc.). The coffee is okay, the wine recommendation is great, and the service is attentive. Considering its high price I believe 3 star is reasonable.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: My lamb was cooked on point. Gravy was tasty and fries were good. Place is really nice. Good value for money. Recommend it.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Food was good, but the glass of wine has to be served at the table and not coming directly the kitchen.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Good service, great food. We had made a reservation but had to wait for our table for 15 min. They offered us a drink on the house while waiting.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: A small restaurant with excellent meat. Nice staff that do their best to make you feel welcome and they succeed every time I have been there.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Many thanks for the awesome virtual Team Dinner you organised for us yesterday! So much love, care and delicious foods and drinks in our boxes! All very scrumptious!! Thank you, thank you, thank you!! We will see you soon in your lovely restaurant once opened again in 2021!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text:
Absolutely the best steak in Amsterdam.

Don't even think about going anywhere else..

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Good atmosphere and the meat was quite good.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Chateau Briand done perfectly every time in the Green egg - if only it was BYO wine so I could bring a big Aussie red to go with it

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Great Chateaubriand, reasonably priced for the quality.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Really nice place. The food was excellent. I enjoyed everything i ate.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Excellent food, excellent service, lovely atmosphere.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Nice casual restaurant, with good food prepared on a Green Egg for reasonable prices.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Amazing chateaubriand. Absolutely incredible. Finished of with the very nice cheese platter.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Amazing food and excellent service! Nice, cozy place.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Very nice atmosphere and good steak

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text:
The SenT Restaurant brilliantly combines a classic French Brasserie vibe with a thoroughly modern twist.
Of course, SenT Kitchenâ€™s heroes are their Chateaubriand, but donâ€™t leave â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Nice little restaurant in a quiet street in De Pijp (great location), and if you enjoy meat, most of them are cooked in The 'egg' (barbecue), and taste delicious. I also tried the octopus as a starter... Yum! â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text:
Its a decent restaurant with a high class meat experience. Chateaubriand is their speciality and itâ€™s very good. You get what you pay for. Big and tasty salad, nice fries coming along with meat is delicious.
I go here few times in a year to enjoy good/fast service and meat.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The octopus is phenomenal. The meat as well although unfortunately we ordered it medium rare and got well done and a bit dry. Count on about 50 euros per person.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Great service, price, food in a cozy atmosphere. The beef is amazingly good.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Best porc ever. And there is a cat.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: I feel like this is a bit of a hidden gem. Beef and pork cooked to perfection on a "green egg".  Perfect fries. Great wine pairing.  The relaxed atmosphere belies a great fine dining experience that was frankly unexpected.  Personally.. I'd â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Best steak that I have tasted.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The food was excellent and they had very reasonable prices. They don't have many options, but everything we had was perfect. The leg of lamb was to die for, as well as the veal. Highly recommend this place, we were able to get a reservation on a Friday night but the place was pretty busy. Service was great as well!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Best chateaubriand steak you can find in Amsterdam. And I do not exaggerate! Being a foodie and big fan of exclusive food experiences I am forever addicted to this place. No Michelin star level prices in there, but their meat does deserve a star!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: I happened to walk past this place on a busy Saturday evening. It looked cosy and lively so we decided to have dinner there. The staff were really friendly and attentive, giving nice drink and food suggestions. Nice place for a date or â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Fresh ingredients used, generous portions, well cooked. Nothing too fancy, just well prepared and very good service. Price is fair compared to similar brasseries who clearly overprice their meat dish. Let s face it, a cote de boeuf or a rib eye is easy to cook and doesn t require to be a stared cook...

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Oh wow!!! Amsterdam was never a good place for food. But it's changing and this is one of the best French restaurants I've ever visited. Not too much fuss, great atmosphere, great service (also not common for the Netherlands) and the most important, perfectly made food. Not cheap but definitely worth it. I'd love to come again. Thanks.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Really good meat, perfect wood smoke but not over powering, bearnaise also well balanced, fries also deserve a praise. Plus good quality/price ratio, it has been many times and never disapointed !

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Great place! Excellent food and service, managers are professional, funny and extremely helpful! Lucky we found a table without reservation.. Iâ€™ll go again for sure the next time in Amsterdam!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The chateaubriand at Sent is consistently excellent. Haven't found a more delicious steak in Amsterdam. Sauces and fries also great and the service always very friendly.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The octopus entree and lamb main were great. Capable kitchen crew that knew to adapt for gluten allergy. They usually have GF fries/chips but put breadcrumbed deep fried stuff in the day before we came... no chips for us but, I'm glad they knew to not serve them.

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Amazing food, ambiance and experience!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Food was good, but the service was abhorrent. They forgot our starters, salads and tried to serve me Coke, when I specifically asked for Zero or Light. Clearly not enough staff and the waiter we had wasnâ€™t quite up to her job, as she didnâ€™t â€¦

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Best steak I ever had! Literally you could eat it with a spoon! The service was amazing. We really enjoyed everything about the restaurant!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Had our New Years dinner here. Great food, especially the meat, great selection of wines and good dessert. Friendly owners and good cosy location!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: The food is amazing, perfectly prepared and pleasing to the palette.   They are very helpful and helped us with taxi arrangement to get back to the hotel.  Very nice people.

Review Text: Very good food, meat is super delicious! Definitely try the octopus for your starter (every time Iâ€™m in Amsterdam I come here and always suggest everyone to visit this place)

Review Text: Wonderful! I really can recomment this place! If you love meat and a nice atmosphere, then you found a nice option here. Very nice service and delicious food!

Name: Brasserie SenT
Review Text: Awesomely prepared, juicy chateaubriand fillet, lickalicious starters and a very good selection of wines! Great, cozy atmosphere and excellent service too. I highly recommend it!
